name: broccoli-funnel
notes: Broccoli plugin for filtering files during Broccoli build process. Broccoli is a build tool (like webpack, gulp, rollup) used primarily in Ember.js ecosystem for asset pipeline processing. broccoli-funnel filters/selects files from input nodes based on regex patterns, globs, and other criteria during build-time. Like all Broccoli plugins (broccoli-merge-trees, broccoli-concat, broccoli-uglify-js) and build tools, this is designed for development/build workflows, not runtime execution in Workers.
